original_text: I tore the kingdom away from the house of David and gave it to you, but you have not been like my servant David, who kept my commands and followed me with all his heart, doing only what was right in my eyes.
korean_text: 나라를 다윗의 집에서 찢어내어 네게 주었거늘 너는 내 종 다윗이 내 명령을 지켜 전심으로 나를 따르며 나 보기에 정직한 일만 행하였음과 같지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: I tore the kingdom away from the house of David
but you have not been like my servant David
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 나의 종 다윗과 같지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and followed me with all his heart
doing only what was right in my eyes
